For managing your devices, services, and requests
For providing better services based on accurate location, e.g. finding compatible devices nearby. You can restrict access to your location info in the settings at any time.
For analyzing how our products and services are used and gathering stats that might help us improve them
For accessing and adding calendar events
For accessing accurate and approximate location info
For accessing and adding items into the call history, making calls, and accessing phone status
For accessing, sending, and receiving messages
For storing and maintaining information about you that we use to provide services or fulfill legal obligations
